short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ten4 plugin allows you to send emails with a click, shows each load profit, and applies preferences directly inside the load board

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your favorite load boards such as DAT One and more.
* Email brokers instantly directly from your favorite load boards
* Show load profit for every load based on your truck costs and payment
* Apply driver and fleet preferences such as blacklisted states, onboarded or blacklisted brokers
* Help your team to prevent fraud by maintaining a list of contacts you want your team to avoid contact 
* Access maps in a single click
